text: While the enemies of the Emperor still draw breath, there can be no peace.

text: The universe has many horrors yet to throw at us. This is not the end of our struggle. This is just the beginning of our crusade to save Humanity. Be faithful! Be strong! Be vigilant!

text: There is no time to plan, there is no space to think. No respite. No forgiveness. There is only war.

text: Some may question your right to destroy ten billion people. But those who understand realise that you have no right to let them live.

text: We're the Death Korp of Krieg, son. Did you think that was just a pretty name? We never retreat. We fight and we die, that's the Krieg way.

text: If your battle plan's working, it's probably a trap.

text: The only compassion available to Mankind’s adversaries is a quick death.

text: What does not kill me… is not trying hard enough.

text: There are more things in the darkness than man can ever count.
